Representatives are expected to attend or to send an alternate in their stead. The meetings are open to all administrators. The final meeting is the annual Year-End Luncheon in May, to which all administrators are invited.     At each AMC general meeting, voting Representatives approve the minutes of the previous meeting. Approved minutes are posted below.               2014-15     October 7, 2014 (PDF)     November 4, 2014 (PDF)     December 2, 2014 (PDF)     January 6, 2015 (PDF) -- Agenda     February 3, 2015 (PDF) -- Agenda     March 3, 2015 (PDF) -- Agenda     April 7, 2015 (PDF) -- Agenda     May 7, 2015 (PDF)          2013-2014     October 1, 2013 (PDF)     November 5, 2013 (PDF)     December 3, 2013 (PDF)     January 7, 2014 (PDF)     February 4, 2014 (PDF)     Guest Presentation: PeopleSync (PDF)         March 4, 2014 (PDF)     April 1, 2014 (PDF)     May 8, 2014          2012-2013     October 2, 2012 (PDF)   November 6, 2012 (Meeting Canceled due to Hurricane)   December 4, 2012   January 8, 2013 (PDF)     February 5, 2013 (PDF)   Guest: Linda Mills: Update on Global Sites (PDF)       March 5, 2013 (PDF)     Letter to John Sexton Re: NY Times Articles       April 2, 2013 (PDF)   Guest Presentation by Martin Dorph and Tony Jiga: University Budget       May 9, 2013 - NYU Chemistry, Brown Building, 3rd Floor Conference Room (capacity: ~6 people)   NYU Chemistry, Brown Building, 5th Floor Conference Room (capacity: ~7 people)   NYU Chemistry, Brown Building, 6th Floor Seminar Room (capacity: ~30 people)   NYU Chemistry, Silver Center, 7th Floor Seminar Room (capacity: ~15 people)   NYU Chemistry, Silver Center, 8th Floor Conference Room (capacity: ~6 people)   NYU Chemistry, Silver Center, 10th Floor Conference Room (1001P) (capacity: ~10 people)   NYU Chemistry/Biology, Silver Center, 10th Floor Seminar Room (1003) (capacity: ~50 people)   NYU Chemistry Office Hours Section "A"   NYU Chemistry Office Hours Section "B"               Updated on 02/20/2015                     * | Contact Us | © New York University , Arts and Science
